name: api_physics2d_SliderJoint2D
description: Joint that restricts the motion of a Rigidbody2D object to a single line.

properties.name: angle
properties.description: The angle of the line in space (in degrees).

properties.name: autoConfigureAngle
properties.description: Should the angle be calculated automatically?

properties.name: limits
properties.description: Restrictions on how far the joint can slide in each direction along the line.

properties.name: limitState
properties.description: Gets the state of the joint limit.

properties.name: motor
properties.description: Parameters for a motor force that is applied automatically to the Rigibody2D along the line.

properties.name: referenceAngle
properties.description: The angle (in degrees) referenced between the two bodies used as the constraint for the joint.

properties.name: useMotor
properties.description: Should a motor force be applied automatically to the Rigidbody2D?

properties.name: GetMotorForce
properties.description: Gets the motor force of the joint given the specified timestep.

properties.name: Destroy
properties.description: Removes a GameObject, component, or asset.

properties.name: DontDestroyOnLoad
properties.description: Do not destroy the target Object when loading a new Scene.

properties.description: Retrieves any active loaded object of Type type.

properties.name: FindFirstObjectByType
